programme.desc: Nayla had to impersonate two people, in order to complete her vision.But later, Nayla was hit with a brick wall, for playing two people. The next time she becomes a wealthy beauty, she also becomes a man to get the job done. Unfortunately in the end, Nayla is helped by a detective, who turns out to like her.So what exactly is Nayla's work with the detective like, so that they can both get close and love each other huh?

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 243
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attractedtoher.

programme.title: Duren Caem Gini Masa Iya Disekip_x000D__x000D_
programme.desc: A handsome widower named Doni who has two children, a girl and a boy. Doni, who is alone after his wife passed away, actually needs a life companion, but Doni is reluctant to date. On the other hand, there is a woman named Wita who plans a kidnapping in a big house with her boyfriend. To smoothen her plan, Wita disguises herself as Dewi and becomes a babysitter at the house she is targeting, Doni's house.

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. programme.title: Lage Raho Munna Bhai

programme.title: Khandani Shafakhana

programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her familys happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ethirneechal Thodargiradhu
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Malar - Serial
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: Zombi Child
programme.desc: Haiti, 1962. A man is brought back from the land of the dead and forced to work in the hell of the sugar cane plantations. Fifty-five years later, at the prestigious Legion d'Honneur boarding school in Paris, a Haitian teenager tells her new friends the secret that haunts her family...

programme.title: Fanfare
programme.desc: Jules, a 20 year-old fairground traveller, has experienced three powerful emotions and must be punished. He has the choice between either a mime or a brass band which will, for the next twelve months, appear each time he experiences one of his excessive emotions. He opts for the brass band.

programme.title: #Investigation - EP 10
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 7
programme.desc: 1939. In Canada a woman's place was in the home, looking after her husband and children. But during the war, with the men away at the front, women were working and contributing to the war effort. For the first time society saw women differently: their emancipation had begun.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 10
programme.desc: In 2022, the 60 largest global banks invested 669 billion dollars in oil, gas and coal. How can we find out what our bank does with our money? Should we change bank to make an impact? We examine the answers with the economist Christel Dumas.

programme.title: 39-45, En Sol Canadien - EP 2
programme.desc: Claude Legault heads to Monteregie, to find out more about a camp where some 37,000 German prisoners of war were held after being captured by the British and transferred to Canada. He meets Micheline Lanctot, whose parents developed close ties to one of the soldiers.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 1
programme.desc: Are all the paper bags in the supermarket fruit and veg section really made from recycled paper? What happens to the cardboard boxes thrown into the recycling bins? Hugo Clement explores the murky world of cardboard packaging, to discover that it's not quite as virtuous and environmentally-friendly as we think.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 23
programme.desc: In August 2022, Yann Quennet left his native Brittany to sail around the world single-handedly, aboard ''Baluchon'', a four metre yacht he built entirely by himself. Having left as a complete unknown, he and his minimalist adventures gradually won the hearts of the public via social media.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1566
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 1
programme.desc: Julien sets off to visit Jean-Luc Kanape living in the land of his ancestors, where he has built a small off-grid cabin. Guardian of this territory of the caribou, he shares with Julien his love of the forest and of handing down the ancestral knowledge of the Innu.

programme.title: Nos Ombres D'algerie
programme.desc: Sixty years on, can an image help us to understand the Algerian War? When faced with a traumatic event, silence becomes the instinctive choice. Illustrators look (back) at their family history using the graphic novel to give voice to the Algeria of their childhood, confronting the ghosts of their past.

programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.desc: Alix is surprised to learn that Humpty-Dumpty thinks that he's an egg laid by a... spider. He even asks her to show him how to become one. She has great fun dressing him up and making him climb walls.

programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.desc: Walk along the forgotten tracks in the Basque Country. Enthusiasts rediscover deserted paths, bring magnificent abandoned villas back to life or add a modern touch to local cuisine. In their way, they perpetuate historical memories.

programme.title: Gardez Le Sourire
programme.desc: Vienna in the 1930s. Jean has no work and nowhere to live. He is so desperate that he thinks about drowning himself in the Danube. But a young woman, Marie, jumps off a bridge just before him. Jean saves her and comforts her. Suicide is never an option again.

programme.title: Allegresse
programme.desc: Whilst he's supposed to be looking after his daughter, with whom he isn't particularly close, a funeral director is entrusted with the ashes of a complete unknown. Together they try to find a way to pay tribute to the deceased and end up forging unexpected ties...

programme.desc: The friends take a weekend break to switch off, but their various child-based concerns soon catch up with them. Annie is wondering if she should accept the day-care place, Josee has to handle the reproaches made by her ex, and Nadine is worrying about her daughter.

programme.title: Survivre A Ses Enfants - EP 6
programme.desc: Josee invites everyone over to her place for a major announcement. Kamyar and Nadine arrive with all four kids in tow and Annie is concerned that the house won't be sufficiently baby-proof for little edouard. Megane is finding it very difficult to share her space with so many people.

programme.title: Survivre A Ses Enfants - EP 7
programme.desc: During Megane's dance show, Josee is squashed between her ex and his new partner who are obviously not getting on, at all. Nadine is worried about Jasmine who's fantasising about tattoos.

programme.title: Movie - Bagheera
programme.desc: Building on his aversion to women, Bagheera, a hitman, creates a dubious application in order to kill women at anyone's request.

programme.title: Movie - Inga Enna Solludhu
programme.desc: A man is forced into an unwanted marriage in order to become rich quickly with his wife's money. However, his foolishness and misfortune push his wife to attempt suicide.

programme.title: Movie - Kuppi
programme.desc: After the assassination of a prominent leader, Shivrasan takes shelter in a house owned by Ranganath. When the police zero in on the hideout after thorough investigation, they get attacked.

programme.title: Movie - Maalai Pozhuthin Mayakathilaey
programme.desc: A real-time playout of events at a coffee shop over nearly two hours on a rainy evening. A married couple fight over the lack of romance in their lives, while it blossoms between two strangers just a table away.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Uyirodu Uyiraga
programme.desc: Ajay, a young man, is diagnosed with chronic brain tumour. He accepts his condition and lives a simple life, but Anjali, who loves his optimism, decides to lie to him in order to win his heart.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Pandi
programme.desc: To save his mother from a death sentence, Pandi kidnaps daughters of some high-profile people in society and demands his mother's release. He claims that she has been wrongly framed.

programme.title: Movie - Vazhve Mayam
programme.desc: Raja and Devi fall in love with each other and get engaged. However, when Raja learns that he is suffering from cancer, he hides it from Devi and calls off the engagement.

programme.title: Movie - Rhythm
programme.desc: Karthikeyan, a photo editor in Mumbai, is a widower whose parents wish to see him settled and happy. Chitra, a widow with a son, gives them hope, unaware that their pasts are intertwined.

programme.title: Movie - Friends
programme.desc: A man values his best friend more than anything else in the world. One day he confesses a dark secret from their childhood to his wife, which is overheard by another. Once the secret gets out, the friendship is destroyed.

programme.title: Movie - Pori
programme.desc: Hari's father, a retired teacher, helps him in setting up a bookshop but a businessman from Malaysia claims that it belongs to him. As Hari begins to investigate, a real estate scam is exposed.

programme.title: Movie - Machie
programme.desc: Dushyant, a rich spoilt brat, arrives from Mumbai to study in a college in Kovai. As a fresher in a medical college, he meets four of his classmates who are not city slickers like him and come from middle-class families.

programme.title: Movie - Mahan Kanakku
programme.desc: Jeeva's brother-in-law is harassed by bank officials despite having paid off all loans. When he finally commits suicide, Jeeva takes advantage of the loopholes in banking to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Jananam
programme.desc: An angry young man is deeply affected by the sufferings of his friends who struggle to find a job. This leads him to lash out against the corrupt society.

programme.title: Movie - Melmaruvathur Arpudhangal
programme.desc: A god-fearing woman gets married to a man who is equally religious. However, her life turns upside down when her husband accuses her of being unfaithful.

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Mappillai
programme.desc: Thangadurai, who works as a coolie, lies to Janaki that he is rich and marries her. When Janaki's mother learns about this, she plots to destroy their marriage, but succumbs to their love.

programme.title: Movie - Avasara Police 100
programme.desc: A hardened criminal seeks revenge against his father for abandoning his mother. Soon, he finds a policeman who is a doppelganger of himself and decides to manipulate him for his own motive.

programme.title: Movie - Pottu Amman
programme.desc: A black magician kills 27 babies, each born under a different star, to attain extraordinary powers. However, he realises that he has to kill one more baby, born under a rare star, to become omnipotent. Pottu Amman comes to rescue the baby from the black magician.

The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: PL ePREMIER LEAGUE 2024/25: GRAND FINALS (Live)
programme.desc: Join us for coverage of the grand final of the 2025 ePremier League.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 31
programme.desc: After a nomadic start to his career, it now seems that Pervis Estupinan has found his footballing home at Brighton & Hove Albion. The Ecuadorian international takes The Big Interview to the beachfront where he talks about influence of a former professional in the family while growing up, how playing in Spain helped him to become the Premier League performer he is today and his excitement for the future playing under Fabian Hurzeler.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 32
programme.desc: To celebrate Non-League Day, this week The Big Interview travels to Portman Road to speak with Ipswich Town's, Jack Taylor. Having scored in England's top 5 leagues, Taylor talks through his career from Barnet to the Premier League. The 26-year-old also shares his views on Ipswich's season to date, the impact Kieran McKenna's had on his game as well as his hopes for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 20
programme.desc: PL Stories looks into the extraordinary journey of Emmanuel Adebayor, from his prolific Premier League career with Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, and Crystal Palace, to the harrowing experience of surviving the Togo bus attack in 2010. We dive deep into his rise as one of Africa's finest football talents, and how the near-death tragedy profoundly impacted his life, shaping his resilience and outlook beyond the game.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 33
programme.desc: PL Stories takes an intimate look at the controversial and charismatic career of Nicklas Bendtner, exploring his rise to fame and the challenges that came with it. We follow Bendtner's journey from Premier League star to returning to his hometown in Denmark, where he reflects on his highs, lows, and the impact of his larger-than-life persona.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 38
programme.desc: After a meteoric rise through Cardiff's youth system, Aaron Ramsey's dream of playing for one of the world's biggest clubs was realised. But just as his career was reaching new heights, a devastating double leg break threatened to bring it all crashing down. The Wales captain takes us through his footballing journey to date.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 51
programme.desc: Season 2023 - 2024 has arguably been the greatest since the birth of the Premier League in 1992. Three elite teams racing to the finish line. Each of them believing this season will end in glory. The script of the story is captivating. Manchester City going for an historic fourth consecutive Premier League title. Arsenal looking for their first title in twenty years following their late season collapse in 2023.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (MNC)
programme.desc: The 2023/24 Premier League season will be forever remembered as one of the greatest campaigns ever. From an absorbing title race, Jurgen Klopp leaving Liverpool to Luton living the dream in the top-flight - Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2023/2024 (GB: HAALAND)
programme.desc: From free kicks to bicycle kicks, relive some of the most memorable strikes from 2023/24 in a Premier League season where there's been a record number of goals scored.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 5
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by title winning captains Tim Sherwood and Wes Morgan to relive the two greatest underdog stories of the Premier League era.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6
programme.desc: Blackburn Rovers' Premier League title win in 1994/95 was a historic achievement. Under the guidance of Kenny Dalglish, and fuelled by the prolific partnership of Alan Shearer and Chris Sutton, the small-town club dethroned Manchester United and reached the pinnacle of English football. Captain Tim Sherwood recalls the key moments.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen burst onto the scene for Liverpool at just seventeen years of age, and in two consecutive seasons the teenage sensation won the Premier League Golden Boot. Owen recalls those campaigns for the Reds, reliving the key moments that helped him develop into one of the greatest players of his generation.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 10
programme.desc: Michael Owen is the latest guest in the PL Moments hotseat as he chooses the top ten days from his Premier League career.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 24
programme.desc: From his early days in Finland to lifting the Champions League trophy in 2005, we chart Sami Hyypi's journey to the top of English football. We join him for a snowmobiling adventure across the icy wilderness of Finland and though interviews and personal moments, showcase not only his leadership and skill on the pitch but also his deep connection to his roots.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 25
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Argentine football legend Hernn Crespo. From his early days as a striker with clubs like Parma, Lazio, and Chelsea, to his evolution into a title winning coach, Crespo's career has been filled with highs and challenges. We follow his transition from player to manager and join him at Al Ain, where we get a look into how he navigates the pressures and ambitions of managing one of the UAE's top football clubs.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former Chelsea and Tottenham midfielder Gus Poyet chooses the best eleven teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 2
programme.desc: Will Perry is joined by Premier League winners Owen Hargreaves and Peter Schmeichel to discuss the best title-winning teams in the Premier League era. Expect insightful anecdotes, interesting archive and lively debate across a packed hour-long programme.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 13
programme.desc: In this episode of 1-to-11, the legend that is Claude Makelele selects his ultimate Premier League One to Eleven, featuring the very best players he played with and against. His line-up is filled with world-class talent, boasting legendary names from across the globe who shared the pitch with him during his time in the Premier League.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard joins former England teammate Owen Hargreaves to examine exactly what it takes to become an elite central midfielder.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 9
programme.desc: Arguably the greatest striker the Premier League has ever seen, Thierry Henry sits down with Will Perry to reveal his Top 10 Premier League Moments.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 38
programme.desc: After a meteoric rise through Cardiff's youth system, Aaron Ramsey's dream of playing for one of the world's biggest clubs was realised. But just as his career was reaching new heights, a devastating double leg break threatened to bring it all crashing down. The Wales captain takes us through his footballing journey to date.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 15
programme.desc: With over 200 appearances for Everton, Tim Cahill established himself as the high-energy midfielder who helped drive the side. For PL Stories this week, Cahill talks through his journey to the Premier League from battling his way to make it as a footballer in his native Australia, leaving home as a teenager and adapting to English life, scoring in a World Cup as well as the difficult decision to leave Goodison Park after 8 years.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 9
programme.desc: Former Everton midfielder Leon Osman celebrates the history of Goodison Park and selects the ten greatest Premier League moments to have happened at the iconic stadium

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 32
programme.desc: To celebrate Non-League Day, this week The Big Interview travels to Portman Road to speak with Ipswich Town's, Jack Taylor. Having scored in England's top 5 leagues, Taylor talks through his career from Barnet to the Premier League. The 26-year-old also shares his views on Ipswich's season to date, the impact Kieran McKenna's had on his game as well as his hopes for the future.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 7
programme.desc: Tony Pulis looks back on his most memorable moments at the helm of Stoke City, including the Potters' first-ever appearance in the Premier League in the 2008/09 season.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 6

programme.desc: Former Premier League stars select their dream teams from the best they played with or against, guiding us through their picks with stories from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2017/2018 (MNC)
programme.desc: A review of all the best goals, action and drama from Premier League seasons past.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: FS MMA Chris Wilson vs. Ray Steinbeiss
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! An armbar decides the fate of one fighter in Vancouver, Canada when Chris Wilson and Ray Steinbeiss look to show each other who is king of the submission game.

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 Joel Julio vs.James Kirkland
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Super Welterweight, 10 Round contest featuring Joel Julio (34-2, 31 KOs) vs.undefeated James Kirkland, aka 'Mandingo Warrior' (24-0, 21 KOs) from the HP Pavilion in San Jose, California, USA on March 3, 2009.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roy Jones Jr. vs. Glenn Thomas
programme.desc: At the time of this matchup of two undefeated Middleweights, Roy Jones Jr. was gaining attention as one of the most exciting young fighters in the sport and steadily climbing up the rankings, in the top ten across the four main sanctioning bodies. He faces Glenn Thomas, 24-0, who travelled to Jones' hometown of Pensacola, Florida in a meeting that would bring a shot at the World Title for the winner.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman taking on Carlos Quintana. Also on the card, kickboxing super heavyweight legend Daniel Ghita faces off against Brice Guidon.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Okinoumi, Kotoyuki, Kotoshogiku and Endo from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Travel to the Miami, Florida to witness fitness fanatics face off in the Southeast finals. 30 contestants from across the region have arrived to the tropical coastal city, and the competition is heating up! All these athletes aspire to advance to the nationals in Las Vegas, where Mount Midoriyama waits, and the winner receives half a million dollars plus the coveted title of American Ninja Warrior. Part 2 of 2.

programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Okinoumi, Kotoyuki, Kotoshogiku and Endo from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Travel to the Miami, Florida to witness fitness fanatics face off in the Southeast finals. 30 contestants from across the region have arrived to the tropical coastal city, and the competition is heating up! All these athletes aspire to advance to the nationals in Las Vegas, where Mount Midoriyama waits, and the winner receives half a million dollars plus the coveted title of American Ninja Warrior. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: FS MMA Chris Wilson vs. Ray Steinbeiss
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! An armbar decides the fate of one fighter in Vancouver, Canada when Chris Wilson and Ray Steinbeiss look to show each other who is king of the submission game.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Isidro Ranoni Prieto
programme.desc: From the Lac Leamy Casino in Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, NABA Light Heavyweight Champion Artur Beterbiev looks to continue his streak of knockout victories and secure a shot at the World Title as he steps into the ring against Isidro Ranoni Prieto (26-1, 22 KOs). Beterbiev, the Russian Olympian and Gold Medalist from the World Championships in Milan, enters the fight with a record of 10-0, not allowing any of his opponents to reach the final bell.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Tayfun Ozcan vs Mohamed Khamal
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from the Martini Plaza in Groningen, the Netherlands, features main event Tayfun Ozcan (Turkey) vs. Mohamed Khamal (Morocco).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 4 featuring Shodai, Takakeisho, Ryuden and Aoiyama from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 1 of 4.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 3
programme.desc: When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 99
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po run around in circles in Home Dome. The Noo-Noo joins in and the Teletubbies have fun chasing.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing as they play Peekaboo.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: As everyone else gets their films ready for a big movie night, Zip still doesn't know what his film should be about. He wonders whether he will have a film to show at movie night after all.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Dog and Pug enter the world of the theatre and help act out a Shakespearian play. Pug volunteers to act as the director. He gets slightly carried away but learns a vauable lesson.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: Messy and friends visit Fluff the Cloud's family, and things heat up in flash when her brother Nimby gets the lightnings.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Messy is thirsty for an adventure, so he goes to OKIDO to help his friends solve the mystery of the dried-up oasis.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 54
programme.desc: When Violet tells Monty that a problem is too big for a little boy to solve, he wonders if only big people can solve big problems.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: JoJo has a check-up at the dentist and is hoping to earn a special sticker for looking after her teeth and keeping them clean and fresh!

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are making Great Gran Gran's St Lucian Callaloo soup, but can't buy the last few vegetables needed!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 38
programme.desc: The art gallery is holding a celebration of the colour pink and Sarah is keen to take part.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 39
programme.desc: Bug and his friends lead Sarah & Duck to their outdoor music concert.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 8
programme.desc: When James hears the children of Sodor talking about their latest comic book superhero, he imagines that he too can become a hero.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Evil Pea takes over the Tato Tower HQ and uses Carrot's new security system to keep Supertato out. Supertato and Carrot work on a cunning ice cream plan to sneak back in.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: After watching a solar eclipse, the team head into space to fix the biggest glitch yet!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Glitch is not happy when he has to work with Kyan in a Hollywood film.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Glitch and the Grimbots create some enormous blockages after flushing wet wipes.

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: Lexi is cooking Welsh Glamorgan Sausages using two Welsh ingredients: Caerphilly cheese and leeks. Will Lexi's friends like the taste of the leek when they try her recipe?

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Andy jets off in his safari mobile to the rainforest of Brazil in search of a pygmy gecko.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 25
programme.desc: Squawk takes us on a journey to find Sandy and Seaweed's top Swashbuckle moments.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: The toys are having a racing game.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 50
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 51
programme.desc: When Mum goes out to a baby shower, Dad takes charge of the girls' evening routine. But with Bluey missing Mum, Dad has to pull out all the games he knows to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Cobs try to capture Supertato while Evil Pea is on holiday, but it goes wrong, resulting in Evil Pea getting covered in flour and custard over in the Bath Product's Aisle.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazines 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the shows wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. programme.title: Meet The Press 2025
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2025
programme.desc: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon made its debut from Studio 6B in Rockefeller Center on Feb. 17, 2014. Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Hosted by Dan Murphy at NASDAQ Dubai, "Capital Connection" gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick and Karen Tso, CNBCs flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBCs "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. programme.title: Us Squawk Box
programme.desc: "Squawk Box" is the ultimate pre-market morning news and talk program, where the biggest names in business and politics tell their most important stories. Anchored by Joe Kernen, Becky Quick and Andrew Ross Sorkin, the show brings Wall Street to Main Street. It's a must-see for everyone from the professional trader to the casual investor.

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBCs Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Can Anduril Reboot the US Defense Industry? Emily Chang meets Anduril founder Palmer Luckey for a closer look at his defence tech startup's autonomous fleet and software operations.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ryan Kaji is the reigning king of toy videos and one of YouTube's biggest and highest-paid social media stars. Emily Chang meets Ryan and his parents on the set of his new movie for a look at the young influencer's next act.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the world's biggest streamer.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Rerun)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The World From Above S1
programme.desc: A highly popular, breathtaking series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft down to just a few feet above the ground, we discover new perspectives through thrilling journeys: from mountains and the world's most picturesque cities, to fantastic castles and the great natural wonders of the globe.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Waktunya Srimulat Bercyanda
programme.desc: Nunung is a rich widow who has an only child (Anita Hara). Nunung already has a husband-to-be and wants to get married but is embarrassed because Anita hasn't gotten married yet. Meanwhile, Anita, who also has a husband-to-be (Bedu), doesn't want to get married if her mother (Nunung) isn't married yet.

programme.title: Land Of Santri
programme.desc: Documentary program that tells the daily life of the students at the leading Islamic boarding schools in Indonesia. Land of Santri will open the eyes of the audience with a storyline that often describes the unique and positive curriculum on education in each pesantren so that it can produce quality graduates. The State of Santri provides insight that pesantren education has a quality that is not inferior to other general education.

programme.title: Cahaya Ramadan
programme.desc: An Islamic Talkshow program that is studied in depth with a Doctor of Philosophy, Fahrudin Faiz, the pioneer of "Ngaji Filsafat" and hosted by Maman Suherman or commonly called "Kang Maman".

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: The journey of 3 (three) different individuals participating in the World Major Marathon.

programme.title: Sportlite
programme.desc: Find the history and unique story in every sport branches with Sportlite.

programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.desc: Sportrip Indonesia tries to explore Indonesian sports that combine extreme and traditional sports with the natural beauty of Indonesia.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the regions top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the worlds most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4 - EP 265
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman - EP 564
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman," the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles - EP 475
programme.desc: Foreigners, leaving their homelands behind, have come all the way to new country, South Korea. They chose South Korea not for sightseeing or short-term stay. programme.title: My Only One - EP 13
programme.desc: A woman's life gets twisted one day because of her biological father who shows up after 28 years of absence. The father and daughter meet the "only ones" in their lives and put back together the pieces of their broken hearts.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Under The Microscope - EP 12
programme.desc: The period drama revolves around mathematician Shuai Jia Mo who stumbles upon an old accounting issue in the local municipal level. While attempting to correct the mistake, he triggers tension with upper government officials.

programme.title: Truth - EP 3

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 21
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Angel In-the-Making - EP 24
programme.desc: During their nursing internship at the hospital, final year nursing students, KI LOK (Eliza Sam) together with her classmates TANG LAI-CHING (Moon Lau) and YU YUET-OI (Jinny Ng), are assigned to a ward known as "Hell's ward" to receive training under the supervision of a registered nurse called YEUNG CHI-MING (Tony Hung).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 5
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 2
programme.desc: Sophisticated banker CHEUK YAT YUEN (Lui Leung Wai) mistakes con artist SA FU LOI (Lo Ka Leung) for his half brother CHEUK YAT MING, fortuitously elevating the swindler to one of the leading figures in the banking industry. The lost and found brotherhood has blinded YUEN to FUs real nature and intentions. _x000D__x000D_YUEN is kidnapped overseas by a group of rioters. He undergoes a dramatic personality change after the incident.

programme.title: Born Rich - EP 3

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 31
programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit peoples superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 31
programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit peoples superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Captain Of Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: While driving the police speedboat to hunt down a criminal, Cheung Chau police officer WONG TAI-MUI (Grace Chan) is accidentally caught in a waterspout and travels back in time two hundred years to the Qing Dynasty, where she encounters pirate CHEUNG PO-TSAI (Tony Hung) and the eleventh prince, MAN HO (Ruco Chan).

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 1
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 15
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (II) - EP 17
programme.desc: Ching wins, but the raving Chau greatly annoys to invade Wong. At the end ,all of them are driven out of the Island. Afterwards, Ching and Yung have to overcome many obstacles before they can be reunited again._x000D_On the other hand, Hong and the Kam Emperor, in order to invade the Sung Dynasty , Plot to steal Wus book The Art of War from Sung. Their conspiracy is know by Ching and Yung , and they vow to protect their own country.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 10
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 11
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry.
