programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 13
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: It's a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: Hong Kong tycoon Ren Da Kuan takes care of his family that spans four generations, yet his three sons grapple with their own challenges. Everything changes when his daughter returns from studying in France with her friend Roberto. Roberto brings a wave of transformation to the Ren family, sparking new hope and opportunities for all.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Ninth Happiness
programme.desc: A comedy starring many popular movie stars, this is a story about a magistrate and his brothers aiming to introduce sin and romance into the virtuous community of Rainbow Village. As they vie for the affections of a charming young village maiden, conflicts arise, adding a twist to their mischievous endeavours.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fiance, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Destiny's Champion
programme.desc: An aging fighter relives the mistakes of his violent past through a poor and streetwise kid, who severely injures his nemesis during a battle to win a girl's heart.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: The Death Curse
programme.desc: The medical scientist Tin distributes his inheritance among his eight children from different wives before he dies. Under the supervision of Lawyer Cheung, the eight siblings must gather and pray in their father's old haunted mansion every midnight, otherwise they will lose their right of inheritance.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Tristar
programme.desc: Young priest Hong disguises himself to protect Bai, a prostitute, while Detective Liu investigates her ties to a prostitution ring. Hong finds Bai a lawful job and helps her negotiate with the underworld. Meanwhile, Liu's investigation causes misunderstandings - can he crack down on the gang? How will Hong manage his emotions as Bai falls for him?

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung's house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung's mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master's daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh's epic "The Water Margin", and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief's illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father's death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlord's home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists' cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor's tomb.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: Yu Fang Fang survives the massacre of her master's family at the hands of the Crimson Charm gang but loses her arm in the process. Determined, she vows to team up with a swordsman seeking revenge against the ruthless gang.

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: 3 Kingdoms
programme.desc: Providing the best and the most exciting Taiwanese productions in Mandarin, TVBS Asia offers non-stop news updates, lifestyle and magazine programmes, star-studded talk shows, music, varieties and dramas that fit the needs of Asians with global perspectives.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Atom Boyz
programme.desc: Atom Boyz II, Taiwan's most anticipated male reality talent show, features Ou Han-sheng, Hsieh Kun-Da, and Nine One One's Liao Jian-Jhih as celebrity mentors, with MuMu (Lin Wei-Ni) as the host. The 54 contestants are divided into six distinctively styled groups to compete fiercely against one another. How will they redefine the future of Taiwanese boy bands and become the next supergroup to take the Mandarin music scene by storm?

programme.desc: After the loss of her father in a skiing accident, Li Yan holds a grudge against her mother who gave up her father's treatment. At the same time, Li Yan adopts a puppy whose birthday is the same as the anniversary of her father's death. As Li Yan begins to go through more hardships in life, she starts to understand how things were from her mother`s perspective back then.
